attributes.action: Reverse the rights to remove people from there homes especially children
attributes.additional_details:
As of the 8th July 2020, in the U.K., Public Health Officers have been given the power to remove children (amongst other things) if they are not definitely, but ‘potentially infectious’!!

Are you seriously OK with this????

These documents can be found on the Government website. 

I’d also like to refer you back to 30th June,  when the CDC have announced that the test, does NOT just test for covid but all coronavirus’ including the common cold. 

Are you going to allow your children to be traumatised for a cold?

Are you seriously telling me, that if this is a highly infectious disease, the whole family unit wouldn’t be infected. So why would you remove any one member of a family?

rejection.details:
Children are not being detained and there are no plans to detain children. In most cases, medical treatment and testing already needs parental consent. We therefore don't know what you want to happen. 

You can find out more about what the Coronavirus Act and children here: 
https://fullfact.org/online/children-coronavirus-act/

You can find out how to spot false information online here: https://sharechecklist.gov.uk/ 

The Government has also created an online service to help you out what you can do if you’re struggling because of coronavirus: https://www.gov.uk/find-coronavirus-support

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
